page.title: 10Traffic Surveys in Pembury
page.content: {Transport, Traffic survey,Pembury. Results from a survey in Pembury were gathered from a number of people who used the village in different ways. Motorists, in particular, who travelled through Pembury either daily or twice a week, all thought the by pass was necessary. Whereas others consisting of bus users and infrequent road users saw no reason for the costly development. The shoppers questioned did not think that traffic was much of a problem. They did not think more people would shop here after the by pass. In conclusion the majority thought a by pass was needed desperately. A copy of the survey is on the next page for reference.
